## Conferenece venue discount

For delegates attending the conference who would like to stay at the [**Mantra Mooloolaba Beach**](https://www.mantramooloolababeach.com.au/), please use the promotion code ***AASC2026*** to obtain a 10% off the advertised Flexible Daily Rate at the time of booking. You can contact the hotel reservations team on +61 7 5452 2600 Monday to Friday and quote the promotion code when booking. Please note no room block will be held and all room types are subject to availability at the time of booking.
